name: 7ev3n Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: An R5A file is a file that has been encrypted by 7ev3n ransomware, which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .DOCX, .JPG, .PDF, or .ZIP file, that has been renamed and encrypted by the virus. R5A files can be decrypted for free using a decryption tool available on GitHub.
